titles.title: Better Community Policing Recognition Act
Better Community Policing Recognition Act
A bill to create an award for law enforcement officers who exemplify best practices to reduce the excessive use of force or improve community policing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Better Community Policing Recognition Act
This bill creates an award—the Better Community Policing Award—for law enforcement officers who exemplify best practices or significant innovation to reduce the excessive use of force or improve community policing.
